headline: KLINGER RT120CCM
description: Rotation Stage w/ DC Servo Motor
specstable:
Manufacturer Klinger
Model RT120CCM
Stage Diameter 4.00 in (102 mm)
Stage Opening Diameter 2.50 in (63.50 mm)
Maximum Payload 60.00 lb (27.22 kg)
Other Information

Maxon DC motor with HP encoder
4" Rotary stage with 2.5" thru hole Resoultion 0.001 degree
Gear ratio 1:180
Max velocity 160Deg. / sec.
360 Deg index on stage body

Exterior Dimensions
Width 5.500 in (14.0 cm)
Depth 9.250 in (23.5 cm)
Height 2.500 in (6.4 cm)
Weight 7 lb (3 kg)
